info.description:
The javacvs package is part of the netbeans platform http://www.netbeans.org. The library implements a CVS client protocol in Java. It allows to access CVS servers without setting up an external cvs program.
This version of the javacvs package has the following modifications: - Logging input and output streams now log to java.util.logging.Logger. - The CommandResult contains an extra field for the Version command.
